title: Upgrade from AppStore to latest version as logged in user
custom_preconds:
Given the user have a PlayStore version installed
And the user is logged in

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user upgrade to the latest prod version
And the user has selected favorite team(s)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the upgarade is successful
And there are no crashes
And all the settings are retained
And the favorite team(s) are retained

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user upgrade to the latest prod version
And the user hasn't selected a Favorite team
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the upgarade is successful
And there are no crashes
And all the settings are retained

custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the upgarade is successful
And there are no crashes
And all the settings are retained
And the favorite team(s) are retained

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user upgrade to the latest prod version

And the user hasn't selected a Favorite team
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the upgarade is successful
And there are no crashes
And all the settings are retained

title: Anonymous, No teams, Push denied, Upgrade, enable notifications, add teams
custom_preconds:

- User is anonymous (didn't log in during onboarding)
- No teams were added during onboarding
- Push notifications were denied/skip

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user upgrades to the TF RC build
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the upgrade is successful
And no crashes were observed

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user has skipped  on notifications screen before update

AND the user enables notifications from Settings > Notifications

And tapped on Allow notifications dialog



![](index.php?/attachments/get/14245756)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then Allow notifications toggle will be on
And MiLB News toggle will be on

![](index.php?/attachments/get/14245757)

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user has Denied  Notifications before update


AND the user enables notifications from Settings > Notifications

![](index.php?/attachments/get/14245758)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then Allow notifications toggle will be on
And MiLB News toggle will be on


![](index.php?/attachments/get/14245757)

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user follows teams from Settings > Follow teams screen or from News tab>Follow teams link
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then Teams toggles will be off on the Setting > Notifications screen

custom_steps_separated.content:
Repeat step 1 to step 2

When the user Follow team(s)

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user initially launches the app
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be brought to the Favourite Teams page on Tripple-A tab

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user you open the app for the first time
And Allow/Don't allow tracking
AND choose a favorite team(s) on the Favorite Teams selector page
AND tap on the Next button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will be brought to the Favourite Teams list page
And the selected team(s) text will be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is on the Favourite Teams list page page
And tap on the Next button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will be brought to Notifications page

And Allow First Pitch to send you notifications?dialog will be displayed

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13444802)

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is on the Notifications page
And tap on Allow button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then Milb News channel will be enabled
And first favorite team channel will be enabled
And other favorite teams channels(toggles) will be disabled


![](index.php?/attachments/get/13444801)

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is on the Notifications page
And tap Next
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be brought to the Login/Subscription page

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is on the Login page
And enter the credentials
And tap on the Login button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will be brought to the team page
And there should be Team, News, Scores, Standings, and More tabs
And the user will land on the Team tab

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is on the Login page
And tap on Close button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will be brought to the team page
And there should be Team, News, Scores, Standings, and More tabs
And the user will land on the Team tab
And user can see that it is logged in on More > Settings

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navigates to Settings > Notifications screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then Allow Notifications channel will be toggled on
And MiLB News channel will be toggled on
And the first favorite team will be toggled on
And all other favorite teams will toggled off

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13444803)
